TestCase.name: testDistinctAggWithDuplicateField
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, COUNT(a), SUM(b), SUM(DISTINCT b) FROM MyTable GROUP BY a

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT($0)], EXPR$2=[SUM($1)], EXPR$3=[SUM(DISTINCT $1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, CAST(EXPR$1) AS EXPR$1, EXPR$2, EXPR$3]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[MIN($2) FILTER $5], EXPR$2=[MIN($3) FILTER $5], EXPR$3=[SUM($1) FILTER $4]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, EXPR$1, EXPR$2, =(CASE(=($e, 0), 0, 1), 0) AS $g_0, =(CASE(=($e, 0), 0, 1), 1) AS $g_1]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2}], EXPR$1=[COUNT($0)], EXPR$2=[SUM($3)]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a=[$0], b=[$1], $e=[0], b_0=[$1]}, {a=[$0], b=[null], $e=[1], b_0=[$1]}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testMultiDifferentDistinctAggWithNonDistinctAggOnDifferentColumnAndGroupBy
TestCase.Resource: SELECT SUM(DISTINCT a), COUNT(DISTINCT c) FROM MyTable GROUP BY b

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$1], EXPR$1=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$0=[SUM(DISTINCT $1)], EXPR$1=[COUNT(DISTINCT $2)]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$1], a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{1}], EXPR$0=[SUM($0) FILTER $3], EXPR$1=[COUNT($2) FILTER $4]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, c, =(CASE(=($e, 1), 1, 4), 1) AS $g_1, =(CASE(=($e, 1), 1, 4), 4) AS $g_4]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2, 3}]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[null], $e=[1]}, {a=[null], b=[$1], c=[$2], $e=[4]}]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testMultiDifferentDistinctAggWithNonDistinctAggOnSameColumn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a), SUM(DISTINCT b), MAX(a), MIN(a) FROM MyTable

LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT(DISTINCT $0)], EXPR$1=[SUM(DISTINCT $1)], EXPR$2=[MAX($0)], EXPR$3=[MIN($0)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($0) FILTER $4], EXPR$1=[SUM($1) FILTER $5], EXPR$2=[MIN($2) FILTER $6], EXPR$3=[MIN($3) FILTER $6]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, EXPR$2, EXPR$3, =(CASE(=($e, 1), 1, =($e, 2), 2, 3), 1) AS $g_1, =(CASE(=($e, 1), 1, =($e, 2), 2, 3), 2) AS $g_2, =(CASE(=($e, 1), 1, =($e, 2), 2, 3), 3) AS $g_3]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2}], EXPR$2=[MAX($3)], EXPR$3=[MIN($3)]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a=[$0], b=[null], $e=[1], a_0=[$0]}, {a=[null], b=[$1], $e=[2], a_0=[$0]}, {a=[null], b=[null], $e=[3], a_0=[$0]}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testMultiDifferentDistinctAggWithNonDistinctAggOnSameColumnAndGroupBy
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a), SUM(DISTINCT b), MAX(a), MIN(a) FROM MyTable GROUP BY c

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$1], EXPR$1=[$2], EXPR$2=[$3], EXPR$3=[$4]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$0=[COUNT(DISTINCT $1)], EXPR$1=[SUM(DISTINCT $2)], EXPR$2=[MAX($1)], EXPR$3=[MIN($1)]) +- LogicalProject(c=[$2], a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1, EXPR$2, EXPR$3]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{2}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($0) FILTER $5], EXPR$1=[SUM($1) FILTER $6], EXPR$2=[MIN($3) FILTER $7], EXPR$3=[MIN($4) FILTER $7]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, c, EXPR$2, EXPR$3, =(CASE(=($e, 2), 2, =($e, 4), 4, 6), 2) AS $g_2, =(CASE(=($e, 2), 2, =($e, 4), 4, 6), 4) AS $g_4, =(CASE(=($e, 2), 2, =($e, 4), 4, 6), 6) AS $g_6]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2, 3}], EXPR$2=[MAX($4)], EXPR$3=[MIN($4)]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a=[$0], b=[null], c=[$2], $e=[2], a_0=[$0]}, {a=[null], b=[$1], c=[$2], $e=[4], a_0=[$0]}, {a=[null], b=[null], c=[$2], $e=[6], a_0=[$0]}]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testMultiDistinctAggOnDifferentColumn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a), SUM(DISTINCT b) FROM MyTable
LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT(DISTINCT $0)], EXPR$1=[SUM(DISTINCT $1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($0) FILTER $2], EXPR$1=[SUM($1) FILTER $3]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, =(CASE(=($e, 1), 1, 2), 1) AS $g_1, =(CASE(=($e, 1), 1, 2), 2) AS $g_2]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2}]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a=[$0], b=[null], $e=[1]}, {a=[null], b=[$1], $e=[2]}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testMultiDistinctAggOnDifferentColumnWithGroupingSets
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a), SUM(DISTINCT b) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY GROUPING SETS (c, d)

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$2], EXPR$1=[$3]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0}, {1}]], EXPR$0=[COUNT(DISTINCT $2)], EXPR$1=[SUM(DISTINCT $3)]) +- LogicalProject(c=[$2], d=[$3], a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d, e)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 4}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($2) FILTER $5], EXPR$1=[SUM($3) FILTER $6]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[c, d, a, b, $e, =(CASE(=($e_0, 2), 2, 4), 2) AS $g_2, =(CASE(=($e_0, 2), 2, 4), 4) AS $g_4]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5}]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{c=[$0], d=[$1], a=[$2], b=[null], $e=[$4], $e_0=[2]}, {c=[$0], d=[$1], a=[null], b=[$3], $e=[$4], $e_0=[4]}]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{c=[$0], d=[null], a=[$2], b=[$3], $e=[1]}, {c=[null], d=[$1], a=[$2], b=[$3], $e=[2]}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[c, d, a, b]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d, e)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d, e])

TestCase.name: testMultiDistinctAggOnSameColumn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a), SUM(DISTINCT a), MAX(DISTINCT a) FROM MyTable

LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT(DISTINCT $0)], EXPR$1=[SUM(DISTINCT $0)], EXPR$2=[MAX(DISTINCT $0)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($0)], EXPR$1=[SUM($0)], EXPR$2=[MAX($0)]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testMultiDistinctAggOnSameColumnWithGroupingSets
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a), SUM(DISTINCT a), MAX(DISTINCT a) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY GROUPING SETS (b, c)

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$2], EXPR$1=[$3], EXPR$2=[$4]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0}, {1}]], EXPR$0=[COUNT(DISTINCT $2)], EXPR$1=[SUM(DISTINCT $2)], EXPR$2=[MAX(DISTINCT $2)]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$1], c=[$2], a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d, e)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1, EXPR$2]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 3}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($2)], EXPR$1=[SUM($2)], EXPR$2=[MAX($2)]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2, 3}]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{b=[$0], c=[null], a=[$2], $e=[1]}, {b=[null], c=[$1], a=[$2], $e=[2]}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[b, c, a]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d, e)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d, e])

TestCase.name: testMultiDistinctAndNonDistinctAggOnDifferentColumn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a), SUM(DISTINCT b), COUNT(c) FROM MyTable
LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT(DISTINCT $0)], EXPR$1=[SUM(DISTINCT $1)], EXPR$2=[COUNT($2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1, CAST(CASE(IS NOT NULL(EXPR$2), EXPR$2, 0)) AS EXPR$2]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($0) FILTER $3], EXPR$1=[SUM($1) FILTER $4], EXPR$2=[MIN($2) FILTER $5]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, EXPR$2, =(CASE(=($e, 1), 1, =($e, 2), 2, 3), 1) AS $g_1, =(CASE(=($e, 1), 1, =($e, 2), 2, 3), 2) AS $g_2, =(CASE(=($e, 1), 1, =($e, 2), 2, 3), 3) AS $g_3]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 3}], EXPR$2=[COUNT($2)]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a=[$0], b=[null], c=[$2], $e=[1]}, {a=[null], b=[$1], c=[$2], $e=[2]}, {a=[null], b=[null], c=[$2], $e=[3]}]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testMultiDistinctAndNonDistinctAggOnDifferentColumnWithGroupingSets
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a), SUM(DISTINCT b), COUNT(c) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY GROUPING SETS (d, e)

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$2], EXPR$1=[$3], EXPR$2=[$4]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0}, {1}]], EXPR$0=[COUNT(DISTINCT $2)], EXPR$1=[SUM(DISTINCT $3)], EXPR$2=[COUNT($4)]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$3], e=[$4], a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d, e)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1, CAST(EXPR$2) AS EXPR$2]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{2, 3, 4}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($0) FILTER $6], EXPR$1=[SUM($1) FILTER $7], EXPR$2=[MIN($5) FILTER $8]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, d, e, $e, EXPR$2, =(CASE(=($e_0, 8), 8, =($e_0, 16), 16, 24), 8) AS $g_8, =(CASE(=($e_0, 8), 8, =($e_0, 16), 16, 24), 16) AS $g_16, =(CASE(=($e_0, 8), 8, =($e_0, 16), 16, 24), 24) AS $g_24]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 3, 4, 5, 6}], EXPR$2=[COUNT($2)]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a=[$0], b=[null], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], $e=[$5], $e_0=[8]}, {a=[null], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], $e=[$5], $e_0=[16]}, {a=[null], b=[null], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], $e=[$5], $e_0=[24]}]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[null], $e=[1]}, {a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[null], e=[$4], $e=[2]}]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d, e)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d, e])

TestCase.name: testSingleDistinctAgg
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a) FROM MyTable
LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT(DISTINCT $0)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($0)]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testSingleDistinctAggAndOneOrMultiNonDistinctAgg1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a), SUM(b) FROM MyTable
LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT(DISTINCT $0)], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($0) FILTER $2], EXPR$1=[MIN($1) FILTER $3]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, EXPR$1, =(CASE(=($e, 0), 0, 1), 0) AS $g_0, =(CASE(=($e, 0), 0, 1), 1) AS $g_1]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 2}], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a=[$0], b=[$1], $e=[0]}, {a=[null], b=[$1], $e=[1]}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testSingleDistinctAggAndOneOrMultiNonDistinctAgg2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(a), SUM(DISTINCT b) FROM MyTable
LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($0)], EXPR$1=[SUM(DISTINCT $1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[CAST(CASE(IS NOT NULL(EXPR$0), EXPR$0, 0)) AS EXPR$0, EXPR$1]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[MIN($1) FILTER $3], EXPR$1=[SUM($0) FILTER $2]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[b, EXPR$0, =(CASE(=($e, 0), 0, 1), 0) AS $g_0, =(CASE(=($e, 0), 0, 1), 1) AS $g_1]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{1, 2}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($0)]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a=[$0], b=[$1], $e=[0]}, {a=[$0], b=[null], $e=[1]}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testSingleDistinctAggAndOneOrMultiNonDistinctAggWithGroupingSets1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a), SUM(b) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY GROUPING SETS (b, c)

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$2], EXPR$1=[$3]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0}, {1}]], EXPR$0=[COUNT(DISTINCT $2)], EXPR$1=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$1], c=[$2], a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d, e)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 3}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($2) FILTER $5], EXPR$1=[MIN($4) FILTER $6]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[b, c, a, $e, EXPR$1, =(CASE(=($e_0, 0), 0, 2), 0) AS $g_0, =(CASE(=($e_0, 0), 0, 2), 2) AS $g_2]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2, 3, 5}], EXPR$1=[SUM($4)]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{b=[$0], c=[$1], a=[$2], $e=[$3], b_0=[$4], $e_0=[0]}, {b=[$0], c=[$1], a=[null], $e=[$3], b_0=[$4], $e_0=[2]}]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{b=[$0], c=[null], a=[$2], $e=[1], b_0=[$0]}, {b=[null], c=[$1], a=[$2], $e=[2], b_0=[$0]}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[b, c, a]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d, e)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d, e])

TestCase.name: testSingleDistinctAggAndOneOrMultiNonDistinctAggWithGroupingSets2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(a), SUM(DISTINCT b) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY GROUPING SETS (c, d)

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$2], EXPR$1=[$3]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0}, {1}]], EXPR$0=[COUNT($2)], EXPR$1=[SUM(DISTINCT $3)]) +- LogicalProject(c=[$2], d=[$3], a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d, e)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[CAST(EXPR$0) AS EXPR$0, EXPR$1]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 3}], EXPR$0=[MIN($4) FILTER $6], EXPR$1=[SUM($2) FILTER $5]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[c, d, b, $e, EXPR$0, =(CASE(=($e_0, 0), 0, 2), 0) AS $g_0, =(CASE(=($e_0, 0), 0, 2), 2) AS $g_2]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 3, 4, 5}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($2)]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{c=[$0], d=[$1], a=[$2], b=[$3], $e=[$4], $e_0=[0]}, {c=[$0], d=[$1], a=[$2], b=[null], $e=[$4], $e_0=[2]}]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{c=[$0], d=[null], a=[$2], b=[$3], $e=[1]}, {c=[null], d=[$1], a=[$2], b=[$3], $e=[2]}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[c, d, a, b]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d, e)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d, e])

TestCase.name: testSingleDistinctAggOnMultiColumns
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a, b) FROM MyTable
LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT(DISTINCT $0, $1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($0, $1)]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testSingleDistinctAggOnMultiColumnsWithGroupingSets
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a, b) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY GROUPING SETS (c, d)

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0}, {1}]], EXPR$0=[COUNT(DISTINCT $2, $3)]) +- LogicalProject(c=[$2], d=[$3], a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d, e)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[EXPR$0]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 4}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($2, $3)]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2, 3, 4}]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{c=[$0], d=[null], a=[$2], b=[$3], $e=[1]}, {c=[null], d=[$1], a=[$2], b=[$3], $e=[2]}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[c, d, a, b]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d, e)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d, e])

TestCase.name: testTwoDistinctAggWithGroupByAndCountStar
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, COUNT(*), SUM(DISTINCT b), COUNT(DISTINCT b) FROM MyTable GROUP BY a

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT()], EXPR$2=[SUM(DISTINCT $1)], EXPR$3=[COUNT(DISTINCT $1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, CAST(EXPR$1) AS EXPR$1, EXPR$2, EXPR$3]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[MIN($2) FILTER $4], EXPR$2=[SUM($1) FILTER $3], EXPR$3=[COUNT($1) FILTER $3]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, EXPR$1, =(CASE(=($e, 0), 0, 1), 0) AS $g_0, =(CASE(=($e, 0), 0, 1), 1) AS $g_1]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2}], EXPR$1=[COUNT()]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a=[$0], b=[$1], $e=[0]}, {a=[$0], b=[null], $e=[1]}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testSingleDistinctAggWithGroupBy
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, COUNT(a), SUM(DISTINCT b) FROM MyTable GROUP BY a
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT($0)], EXPR$2=[SUM(DISTINCT $1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, CAST(EXPR$1) AS EXPR$1, EXPR$2]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[MIN($2) FILTER $4], EXPR$2=[SUM($1) FILTER $3]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, EXPR$1, =(CASE(=($e, 0), 0, 1), 0) AS $g_0, =(CASE(=($e, 0), 0, 1), 1) AS $g_1]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2}], EXPR$1=[COUNT($0)]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a=[$0], b=[$1], $e=[0]}, {a=[$0], b=[null], $e=[1]}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testSingleDistinctAggWithGroupByAndCountStar
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, COUNT(*), SUM(DISTINCT b) FROM MyTable GROUP BY a
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT()], EXPR$2=[SUM(DISTINCT $1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, CAST(EXPR$1) AS EXPR$1, EXPR$2]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[MIN($2) FILTER $4], EXPR$2=[SUM($1) FILTER $3]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, EXPR$1, =(CASE(=($e, 0), 0, 1), 0) AS $g_0, =(CASE(=($e, 0), 0, 1), 1) AS $g_1]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2}], EXPR$1=[COUNT()]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a=[$0], b=[$1], $e=[0]}, {a=[$0], b=[null], $e=[1]}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testTwoDifferentDistinctAggWithGroupByAndCountStar
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, COUNT(*), SUM(DISTINCT b), COUNT(DISTINCT c) FROM MyTable GROUP BY a
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT()], EXPR$2=[SUM(DISTINCT $1)], EXPR$3=[COUNT(DISTINCT $2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, CAST(EXPR$1) AS EXPR$1, EXPR$2, EXPR$3]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[MIN($3) FILTER $6], EXPR$2=[SUM($1) FILTER $4], EXPR$3=[COUNT($2) FILTER $5]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, c, EXPR$1, =(CASE(=($e, 1), 1, =($e, 2), 2, 3), 1) AS $g_1, =(CASE(=($e, 1), 1, =($e, 2), 2, 3), 2) AS $g_2, =(CASE(=($e, 1), 1, =($e, 2), 2, 3), 3) AS $g_3]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2, 3}], EXPR$1=[COUNT()]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[null], $e=[1]}, {a=[$0], b=[null], c=[$2], $e=[2]}, {a=[$0], b=[null], c=[null], $e=[3]}]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])
